subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Pat Riley, coach of the Miami Heat, waited to savor his fifth N.B.A. title on the plane trip home, where he opened 22 bottles of Cristal Champagne to celebrate a moment 18 years in the making.
snippet: Pat Riley, coach of the Miami Heat, waited to savor his fifth N.B.A. title on the plane trip home, where he opened 22 bottles of Cristal Champagne to celebrate a moment 18 years in the making.
